text: Gardenia Bakeries Philippines Inc. is a privately owned bread company based in the Philippines. It was founded by Simplicio Umali in 1978 in Singapore as in- store bakery. Gardenia produces different types of cake and bread. One of its products is Pandesal a common bread roll in the Philippines. ==History== During its beginning in 1978, Rose the market leader of Gardenia Bakeries in Singapore expanded its operations in other Asian countries. In 1997, Gardenia entered in the Philippine market and established its first plant in Laguna, Philippines. In 2001 Gardenia launched its own version of bread roll pandesal. In 2003, the company received its Hazard analysis and critical control points and International Organization for Standardization ISO 9001: 2000 certifications from 2003 to 2009 and it has now upgraded to ISO 9001:2008. In 2011, Gardenia Bakeries established its new plant in Cebu City, at the same year the company received its three program achievements awards from the Philippine Department of Trade and Industry. ==References== ==External links== *Official Website Category:Manufacturing companies established in 1978 Category:Food manufacturers of the Philippines Category:Companies based in Laguna (province) Category:1997 establishments in the Philippines
